title: Join Us
text: I personally think its easier to treat this as a ‚Äòstatic‚Äô page that gives an overview of joining the lab as opposed to listing actual ‚Äòjob adverts‚Äô since those will need to then be kept up to date - i.e., someone will have to be responsible for that OR we need to create some vaguely RSS feed-like thing‚Ä¶

title: Join Us
text:
PhD
Looking for a PhD? We typically work through doctoral training programmes in the UK and posts are advertised Nov-Dec.
International students can apply at anytime. We are happy to help with applications for funding. Send your CV and ideas.
We‚Äôve worked with students from Iraq, Kuwait, and Malaysia

title: Join Us
text:
Post Docs
If you are interested in joining the lab as a post doc, via fellowships or independent funding, get in touch with either Andrew or Dylan (email pending), including your CV and a letter describing your experience and interests.
We‚Äôve hosted people from around the world including Chile, Sweden, Germany, and Australia
Positions linked to grants will be posted here too.

title: Join Us
text:
Short Visits
We welcome short visits, study leave and sabbatical visitors!
